articles.author: Sam Marsden, Moises Llorens
articles.title: Barcelona can't cope with Europe's best - Muller - ESPN
articles.description: Thomas Muller said Barcelona can't cope with the intensity of Europe's top sides after they crashed out of the Champions League group stages.
articles.content: Bayern Munich's Thomas Muller said Barcelona can't cope with the intensity of Europe's top sides after the five-time Champions League winners crashed out of the group stages following a 3-0 defeat at… [+2131 chars]

articles.title: Italy fines Amazon $1.3 billion for abuse of market dominance - CNN
articles.description: Italy's antitrust watchdog said on Thursday it had fined Amazon 1.13 billion euros ($1.28 billion) for alleged abuse of market dominance, in one of the biggest penalties imposed on a US tech giant in Europe.
